info.name: SocialNeko Dark Red
info.description:
I made a nice Dark Red userstyle for SocialNeko. At first, I was just going to keep it to myself, but I wanted to try out UserStyles. Some improvements I made:
  • -Most- pages are now centered.
  • AskMe is improved. However, this userstyle is disabled on profiles. If you want to see the improved AskMe,
info.additionalInfo:
Some improvements I made:
  • -Most- pages are now centered.
  • AskMe is improved.

  • Color scheme change.
    • You probably came for this.
